Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Meaty \Meat"y\, a. Abounding in meat. [1913 Webster]

meaty adj 1: like or containing meat; "enough of vegetarianism; let's have a meaty meal" [ant: {meatless}] 2: having substance and prompting thought; "a meaty discussion" [syn: {substantive}] [also: {meatiest}, {meatier}]
